column2: 仲裁者；裁判员：impartially resolves a dispute；（就纠纷或争论）给出意见：give an opinion
提纯，精炼：free from impurities；改善，改进：improve or perfect
反射：change direction；反映，显露：make manifest；思考：think seriously
否认：declare not to be true；证明为假，证伪：prove wrong
使重获新生，使焕然一新：bring back to life；（使）洗心革面：better in character
使复原，使康复：restore to healthy condition；（使）洗心革面：better in character
统治权：right to command；占统治地位或盛行：be predominant
抑制，限制：keeping within certain boundaries；抑制，控制：keep from exceeding
排放：give off；释放，使获得自由：set free；解雇：let go from office
残酷的，无情的：no abatement or severity；固执的，不肯妥协的：yielding in one’s purpose
宗教，信仰：beliefs；（对于宗教信仰的）忠诚，虔诚：loyalty to God
放弃（职位，权力等）：give up；移交，交出：give control or possession
喜好，偏好：appreciation or liking；（愿望达成时的）高兴，满足感：when wishes are met；享受，喜欢：take pleasure
改造，改变结构：alter the structure
抗议，抱怨：expression of protect, complaint
撕裂，猛拉：tear or split apart
（正式地）放弃：give up；宣布与…决裂：refuse to follow
修复，维修：restore；使重获新生，使焕然一新：bring back to life
机智的回答：witty response；打趣，善意的玩笑：good-natured teasing
撤销，废除（法律等）：rescind or annul；宣布与…决裂：refuse to recognize
（技术、设备或原料等的）详单：complete list
抱怨、表达不满：express discontent；渴望：long for
彻底吃饱了的：appetite completely satisfied；充满…的，富于…的：possessing great numbers
（劳作后的）休息：state of resting；平静，宁静：freedom from storm；休息：take a rest；放置，交给他人：safekeeping or another
谴责，责难，批评：express unfavorable opinion
镇压：put down by force；阻止（正常的表达、活动或发展等）：prevent expression
对…暂缓处刑，免罪：postpone or cancel punishment；维持…的运行：prevent from being closed
令人羞愧的事物，耻辱：causes shame；批评，责备：express criticism
堕落者，道德败坏的人：unprincipled person；堕落的，放荡的：morally corrupt；谴责，痛斥：condemn strongly；拒绝，不提供：unwilling to grant
温和地责备，警告：scold gently；不欣赏，不喜欢：unfavorable opinion
否认：declare not to be true；拒绝接受：unwillingness to accept
令人厌恶的：arousing aversion；不和谐的，不协调的：not harmony
酬谢，报答：make repayment；报仇：punish in kind
必需品：something necessary；必不可少的，必备的：necessary
辞职，放弃（职位）：give up office
弹力：resume original shape；恢复能力：ability to recover quickly
（声音）洪亮的，共鸣的：strong in tone
有创造力的，机智的：act imaginatively
反应的，敏感的：quick to respond
急躁的，忧虑的：impatience, uneasiness；难以管束的：resisting control
沉默不语的：inclined to be silent；不愿意的：slow to begin
（尤指机智的）回应，回答：quick, witty reply
报复，复仇：retaliating；为…复仇：retaliating in kind
恢复意识：return to consciousness；再获新生：active again
使厌恶，使反感：fill with disgust；反叛：renounce allegiance
骑马的人：rides；（议案的）附加条款：appended
